article_title: Western envoys shun Nagasaki event over Israel snub
sentence: Almost  40,000  Palestinians  have  been  killed  since  Israel's  massive  military  offensive  in  Gaza,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  says.

article_title: Western envoys shun Nagasaki event over Israel snub
sentence: It  was  triggered  by    the  7  October  Hamas  attacks  on  Israel,  in  which  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  taken  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.
